footer.description: Industrial design and product development studio creating meaningful products for global markets.

about.title: About NBGROUP.TECH
about.subtitle: We are a team of designers, engineers, and strategists passionate about creating products that make a difference in people's lives.

story.title: Our Story
story.p1: Founded in 2012, NBGROUP.TECH began as a small industrial design studio with a big vision: to bridge the gap between beautiful design and practical engineering.
story.p2: Over the years, we've grown into a full-service product development company, helping startups and Fortune 500 companies alike bring their ideas to life. Our approach combines creative design thinking with rigorous engineering to deliver products that succeed in the market.

team.title: Leadership Team
team.subtitle: Meet the people behind our success
team.ceo.bio: 15+ years in industrial design and product development. Former lead designer at major consumer electronics company.
team.designDirector.bio: Specializes in human-centered design and user experience. Multiple Red Dot and iF design award winner.
team.engineeringLead.bio: Mechanical engineering expert with focus on DFM and production optimization. MS in Mechanical Engineering.

values.title: Our Values
values.subtitle: Principles that guide everything we do

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.description: We embrace new technologies and approaches to solve complex design challenges.

collaboration.title: Collaboration
collaboration.description: We work closely with clients as partners throughout the entire process.

excellence.title: Excellence
excellence.description: We never compromise on quality and always strive for the best results.

impact.title: Impact
impact.description: We focus on creating products that make a meaningful difference.

cta.title: Join Our Journey
cta.description: Interested in working together? We're always looking for new challenges.

speaker.description: Complete product design and engineering for AI-powered home assistant with premium audio quality and seamless integration.

thermostat.description: Energy-efficient home climate control system with intuitive interface and advanced scheduling capabilities.

testimonials.title: Client Testimonials
testimonials.subtitle: What our partners say about working with us
testimonials.1: "NBGROUP.TECH transformed our concept into a market-ready product that exceeded our expectations in both design and functionality."
testimonials.2: "The team's attention to detail and engineering expertise helped us achieve significant cost savings while maintaining premium quality."

services.title: Our Services
services.subtitle: End-to-end product development from initial concept to mass production. We combine design thinking with engineering excellence.

strategy.description: We begin with deep market analysis and user research to define product vision, positioning, and business objectives that ensure market success.

timeline.question: What's your typical project timeline?
timeline.answer: Most projects take 3-6 months from concept to production-ready design.

startups.question: Do you work with startups?
startups.answer: Yes, we offer flexible engagement models for startups and established companies.
